attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2024-1288

Date: 2024-12-05

The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advises that Gordon J. Cudjoe of the City of Toronto, in the Province of Ontario, Barrister-at-law, be appointed a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice of Ontario, and a Judge ex officio of the Court of Appeal for Ontario.


 

Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que Gordon J. Cudjoe, de la ville de Toronto, dans la province d’Ontario, avocat, soit nommé juge de la Cour supérieure de justice de l’Ontario, et membre d’office de la Cour d’appel de l’Ontario.

Cudjoe of the City of Toronto, in the Province of Ontario, Barrister-at-law, be appointed a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice of Ontario, and a Judge ex officio of the Court of Appeal for Ontario.
